risk_series.description: Time series of VaR values per asset, date, confidence level, horizon, and estimation window. Each row represents a single VaR estimate at a specific point in time.

metrics.description: Aggregated backtesting metrics over the full evaluation period per asset. Row granularity: asset × confidence_level × horizon × estimation_window. Includes accuracy metrics (hit rate, violation ratio, statistical tests), tail behavior metrics (exceedances), and distributional characteristics (normality tests, skewness, kurtosis).

time_sliced_metrics.description: Time-sliced backtesting metrics computed for specific time periods (year, quarter, month). Row granularity: asset × slice_type × slice_value × confidence_level × horizon × estimation_window. Enables analysis of temporal patterns in VaR performance.

parameter_store.description: Cached rolling mean and volatility parameters estimated per asset, date, and estimation window. Used for computational efficiency and parameter tracking. fit_success indicates whether the parameter estimation was successful.

metadata.note: VaR is estimated strictly per asset using rolling windows under the assumption of conditional normality. No portfolio aggregation or cross-asset covariance modeling is performed.
